name: Scripts for epics
tagline: Some installation scripts for EPICS base and its selected extensions
body:
### Welcome to Scripts for EPICS

These scripts is developing by RAON accelerator control team in order to reduce the painful installation procedure for EPICS Base and its selected Extenstions. Thus, all codes are always developing stages and heavily site-customized. In addition, there is no warranty at all. 

### Authors and Contributors

Jeong Han Lee (@jeonghanlee)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
